response.original_title: The Story of the Nativity: The Truth of Christmas
response.overview: Most Christians think they know the truth about the birth of Jesus Christ and the circumstances surrounding his miraculous conception. But how much of what we know is fact -- and how much is commonly misunderstood fiction? This probing look at the Nativity story not only includes interviews with authors, religious leaders and other scholars; it also takes viewers to the Holy Land sites where the events were said to take place.
response.title: The Story of the Nativity: The Truth of Christmas
